City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 7 P.M.
* 3rd Monday of the month.
* City Hall

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available before the meetings. Minutes are available and approved.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://iowacolony-tx.municodemeetings.com/)

### Contact Us

1. 3144 Meridiana Pkwy
2. Iowa Colony, TX 77583
3. (281) 369-2471
4. Monday - Thursday: 8:00am - 5:00pm
5. Friday: 8:00am - 12:00pm
6. Saturday & Sunday: Closed
